bibl.title: Les associations religieuses en Égypte d'après les documents démotiques
bibl.note: Seven Demotic texts are reedited: P.LilleDem. I 29; P.Cair. II 30605, 30606, 30619, 31178, 31179 and a Hamburg text originally edited by W. Erichsen in Acta Orientalia 26 (1962) 97—107. Two further texts have been studied from photographs and provided with transcription, translation and commentary: P.Berl.Dem. 3115 (pp. 18—19 and plates 38—41) and a Prague text edited by W. Erichsen, P.Prag.Satzung.
